title: Nikobitcoins
author: Nikobitcoins
content: Hello Everyone.As the subject says, $1820 worth of btc and usdt available For Paypal.I will send first if you're trusted with high rank.I can accept escrow too.I'm a verified trader on localbitcoin with over 25,000 trades.localbitcoins dot com/accounts/profile/nikobitcoinsI Accept PayPal for my btc.My Telegram ~ Nikobitcoins1WhatsApp.     ~ +12568010703

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: baristor on April 25, 2023, 05:48:15 PMI can do for 600$ if ur up 4 it. but has anyone traded with this newbie before?The answer is staring right on your face. Check out his trust summary page and see the ratings, both under trusted and untrusted categoryThe last time someone tried to deal with him, they got scammed $25Not sure how both of you are going to pull this off given that both your accounts are painted red.
